title: rotepfau
author: rotepfau
created_time: January 04, 2023, 09:34:02 PMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 07:48:07 PM by rotepfau
content: This is a simple python script that check WhatToMine for most profitable coin then set flight sheet using hive API. Guide and download at:https://github.com/rotepfau/gpumining-profitswitcherDon't thrust. Verify.Happy mining for y'all !

comments.author: rotepfau
comments.body: I'm glad to create this post after almost a year. The script is stable as hell.All it does is get the first coin of your https://whattomine.com/ query URL and apply the respective flight sheet on your rig.*WARNING* It doesn't handle errors or other situations (like ethernet losses). Enjoy the ride, we're just at Lift Hill.
